name: Istituto per la Competitivit√†
membership:
I-Com is associate member of the European Internet Forum (EIF). https://www.eifonline.org/members.html
I-Com is also a member of the Global Trade and Innovation Policy Alliance (GTIPA). https://www.gtipa.org/
goal: I-Com is an Italian think tank based in Rome and founded in 2005 by a group of scholars and managers to promote academic and policies-related debates and innovative analyses on competitiveness. I-Com set up its Brussels office to further develop its activities on a European stage. The institute focuses its research on three main areas, being Energy, Digital and Health.
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Fraud prevention, General and Institutional Affairs, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
